profile:
We do from the biggest to the smallest job and beat any price.
Although our company is relatively new, our crew brings multiple years of experience to the job site. We currently offer a fully licensed (7 years and counting) 6-person crew for all types of abatement and cleanup jobs throughout the Greater Toronto Area (GTA). As the proverbial new kids on the block, we strive to go above and beyond to secure your confidence and continued business. Our continued growth and success in the field hinges on your satisfaction with the work. Our free consultations, competitive pricing, and 100% satisfaction guarantee ensure you are always well served. 
.
.
No matter where you live, the risks associated with asbestos exposure are very real. If you are involved in the trades, or you work in an industrial setting, you need to be especially aware of your surrounding environment. Construction and demolition crews working in hospitals, schools, manufacturing plants, and even residential homes are potentially at risk anytime old components are being removed including insulation, carpeting, wiring, wallboard, popcorn ceilings, siding, roofing, plaster, and many others.
.
.
Limiting one’s exposure to mould at home or work is extremely important as people’s reactions to this fungus can vary drastically. Some may suffer only a sore throat while others may experience asthma-like symptoms and shortness of breath. Window sills, fabrics, cardboard boxes, basements, and rooms with water taps are all susceptible to excess moisture build-up. Dark spots and a musty odor indicate its presence, but unfortunately mould also thrives in locations you can’t easily see: above the ceiling tiles, inside cupboards and closets, and even behind the wallpaper and walls. Renew Air in Scarborough offers mould remediation for residential and commercial customers across Canada.
.
.
When it comes to dealing with hazardous materials, you should demand a team that can verify the safety of your job site or living space with absolute certainty. We are fully licensed and prepared to answer the call 24/7. We don’t consider the job done until you are completely satisfied. With our competitive pricing, we have been kept very busy throughout the years. Although we specialize in the removal of harmful mould and asbestos, our ultimate goal is to protect your health, property, and bottom line.

If you have concerns, a free consultation with our staff should answer any questions you may have. Schedule a convenient time. Call or email us today.

profile:
Ranked Best of 2020, we are a professional mold / asbestos / viral / lead inspection, disinfection and removal company active within Southern Ontario. 

We are the only company to offer inspectors who are certified both as mold inspectors as well as certified home inspectors, (CaNACHI). With this level of knowledge we can provide you will insights others can't. 

We offer three (3) hour turnaround times during regular business hours for inspections...with this level of customer service it's easy to see why we are the best at what we do.  

 

And we pay special attention to the challenges you face when you are concerned about your families health.
 
Maintaining a healthy indoor environment can easily be done with help from our trained and experienced professionals. The air you and your family breathe may be contaminated with black mold spores and other contaminants and dangerous particles. The only way you will know for sure is to have the air in your home inspected. We will be able to provide you with the solutions you need to insure you are breathing fresh and healthy air. When you work with us, you work with specialists who are seasoned, knowledgeable, and who regularly keep up with learning about the latest trends being made in the industry.
  
Our reconstruction teams are licensed City of Toronto contractors and we are also approved by the Province of Ontario’s GreenON Funding, something you will not find any other mold removal company has.

Our professional approach includes the following:
 
-Showing up promptly for your appointment, and prepared with the materials and the latest moisture detection and thermography tools we need.
-Respect for your home and personal belongings
-A thorough examination of your potential contamination issue
-Effective solutions based on the particular problem found in your home
-Professionals ready to address all of your questions and concerns
-Use of high-quality testing equipment and gear for accurate results
-Timely service that doesn’t keep you waiting
 
Take the next step and give us a call today. We thank you for your interest in our services, and we look forward to hearing from you soon and helping to improve the air that you breathe each and every single day!

profile:
Specialist in DSS REPORTS


Asbestos Environmental Of Canada (AEOC) offers expertise in testing and removal of a variety of designated substances including asbestos, mercury and lead, and even mold. DSS Report Experts. For more than 25 years our mold and asbestos reports have provided residential and commercial property owners in the GTA with valuable health and safety information that impacts their construction, demolition or remediation projects.

Whatever the size of your property we have the advanced knowledge and equipment to identify the cause and extent of your problem.


AEOC's Mission
We believe that providing the best service to our clients starts with being specialized in our field. We are fully licensed, insured and certified in removal of hazardous material.

Our Values
Unmatched Service
At AEOC, we pride ourselves on top quality work done by dedicated personnel with up-to-date training and licenses. No job is too big or small for us to handle. We offer the same level of personalized attention irrespective of the scope of work.


Value
We work hand in hand with our clients in assessing, testing and removing mold and asbestos and restoring the contaminated area back to a healthy and liveable space. We work quickly and efficiently and offer inspections and tests immediately, enabling us to send samples of your asbestos or mold to the lab. We then work to effectively remove the hazardous material as soon as lab results are received.


Accountability
We have invested in the latest technology to enhance accuracy and efficiency of testing, reporting, removal and remediation. This helps achieve a quick turnaround without compromising our work quality while reducing your downtime significantly. We understand the risks involved in dealing with hazard substances and would never compromise the well-being of our clients or our staff.


Asbestos Environmental Of Canada is your first choice for testing and remediation of designated substances as well as mold. Schedule your certified inspection today.
We believe that providing the best service to our clients starts with being specialized in our field. We are fully licensed, insured and certified in removal of hazardous material.

www.safeasbestosremoval.ca
